titles.title: Equality and Fiscal Accountability Protection Act of 2023
Equality and Fiscal Accountability Protection Act of 2023
To prohibit the availability of funds to provide assistance to foreign countries that criminalize or discriminate based on sexual orientation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Equality and Fiscal Accountability Protection Act of 2023
This bill prohibits expending federal funds to provide assistance to any country that has enacted laws that criminalize or discriminate on the basis of sexual orientation, including laws that criminalize homosexuality or same-sex marriage.
